name: 80s Character Names Online Trivia | Name the Movie | 15 Questions

questions.explanation:
The Witches of Eastwick.

	The role of this witch was popularized by Cher.

Haunted Honeymoon.

	Vickie Pearle was brought to life by Gilda Radner in her last collaborative effort with her husband Gene Wilder.

The Goonies.

	Sean Astin played this lovable goonie with asthma.

Deathtrap.

	Michael Caine plays this playwright who conspires to murder his wife.

9 to 5.

	Dabney Coleman played this "lying, sexist, egotistical, hypocritical bigot."

Shag:  The Movie.

	Paige Hannah played Miss Luanne Clatterback.  She is the sister of Daryl Hannah.

Sixteen Candles & 16 candles.

	Molly Ringwald played this poor girl whose whole family forgot her sixteenth birthday.

Police Academy.

	Steve Guttenberg played this character in four of the "Police Academy" films.

Blind Date.

	Kim Basinger in her first film role where she is allergic to alcohol.  She was also allergic to alcohol in "Final Analysis."

Back to the Future.

	Lea Thompson played Michael J. Fox's mom in all three of the "Back to the Future" installments.

Beetlejuice.

	This was a skinny Alec Baldwin.

Peggy Sue Got Married.

	Nicolas Cage got to play this character under the direction of his uncle, Francis Ford Coppala.

Ghostbusters.

	Harold Ramis reprised his role in "Ghostbusters II".

Real Genius.

	Val Kilmer in one of few comedic roles.

Dirty Dancing.

	This famous hotel owner was played by Jack Weston.
